FullInspector.ISerializedObject Interface Reference

The API that the editor code needs to interact with UnityObjects. More...

Properties

bool Restored [get, set]
 Has the object been restored? More...
 
List< UnityObject > SerializedObjectReferences [get, set]
 This list contains a set of object references that were encountered during the serialization process in this object graph. These need to persist through a Unity serialization cycle. More...
 
List< string > SerializedStateKeys [get, set]
 The serialized state for this UnityObject - the key values. The actual value is in SerializedStateValues at the same index. More...
 
List< string > SerializedStateValues [get, set]
 The serialized state for this UnityObject - the actual values. The key for this value is in SerializedStateKeys at the same index. More...
 

Detailed Description

The API that the editor code needs to interact with UnityObjects.

Member Function Documentation

void FullInspector.ISerializedObject.RestoreState ( )

Restore the last saved state.

Implemented in FullInspector.BaseBehavior< TSerializer >, and FullInspector.BaseScriptableObject< TSerializer >.

void FullInspector.ISerializedObject.SaveState ( )

Save the current state.

Implemented in FullInspector.BaseBehavior< TSerializer >, and FullInspector.BaseScriptableObject< TSerializer >.

Property Documentation

bool FullInspector.ISerializedObject.Restored
getset

Has the object been restored?

List<UnityObject> FullInspector.ISerializedObject.SerializedObjectReferences
getset

This list contains a set of object references that were encountered during the serialization process in this object graph. These need to persist through a Unity serialization cycle.

List<string> FullInspector.ISerializedObject.SerializedStateKeys
getset

The serialized state for this UnityObject - the key values. The actual value is in SerializedStateValues at the same index.

List<string> FullInspector.ISerializedObject.SerializedStateValues
getset

The serialized state for this UnityObject - the actual values. The key for this value is in SerializedStateKeys at the same index.
